name: AIstroids
description:
For GameJam - Wowie Jam 4.0

Theme: Collaborate with AI

Developed in GDevelop 5 (my first time working with GDevelop) its an astroids type game where the AI tries to avoid astroids and shoots astroids while they are in line of sight.

The AI is still very dump and will sometimes actively go for astroids - dont ask :)

After each astroid is destroyed a gem will appear, collect these to unlock special abilities like an extra ship / force field / explosion and more health.

Assets by Kenny

Music by https://www.aiva.ai/

Twitter: @darkroasttech

Instagram: @darkraosttech

YouTube: DarkRoastTech
